body.p: Threshing floor where Uzzah was struck down by God as he attempted to steady the ark of the covenant (1 Chr 13:9, nlt mg). The parallel passage in 2 Samuel 6:6 refers to this place as “the threshing floor of Nacon.” Following the death of Uzzah, the place was renamed Perez-uzzah, which means either “the breach of Uzzah” or “the outbreak against Uzzah” (2 Sm 6:8; 1 Chr 13:11).
